Package com.example.fitnesstracker

Class AdapterViewPager

java.lang.Object
androidx.viewpager.widget.PagerAdapter
androidx.fragment.app.FragmentPagerAdapter
com.example.fitnesstracker.AdapterViewPager
public class AdapterViewPager extends androidx.fragment.app.FragmentPagerAdapter
Adapter for managing and displaying fragments in a ViewPager. This adapter is used to create and manage fragments dynamically in a ViewPager, allowing fragments to be swiped between with corresponding titles.
Author:
Miles Nichols
